product_name: The North Face Ampere T-Shirt - Men's
long_description: With FlashDry-XD(TM) fabric for quick-drying performance with high durability, The North Face Ampere T-Shirt for men features mesh panels over high-heat areas to maximize comfort while running. Specialized FlashDry-XD fabric wicks moisture, breathes well and dries quickly; plus, it's abrasion-resistant to increase durability. Ventilation panels are aligned with high-heat areas to increase breathability. Set-in sleeves reduce chafing. The North Face Ampere T-Shirt for men is engineered for a comforable range of motion while you run.
short_description: With FlashDry-XD(TM) fabric for quick-drying performance with high durability, The North Face Ampere T-Shirt for men features mesh panels over high-heat areas to maximize comfort while running.
